results.content:
QUICK AND DIRTY.

Not for absolute beginners, but you will get a website in the end that's accessible by anyone.

TIP: Play on 1.5 speed and 720p resolution, and don't get too caught up with what he says. He has a strong Chinese accent and English is evidently not his first language... so JUST WATCH AND LEARN, DON'T REALLY LISTEN.

Good if you want to copy a website, probably bad if you want to make your own unique website. 

Lots of hacking Boostrap and CSS.

response.content: Thanks for taking this course! I wanna let the beginners have a quick taste of how they build up a website and get the end product. So it leverages bootstrap and css. I will improve my ascent and make it clearer next time!
